name: SelectionOptions
shortdesc: Options for selection status in relation to previously selected objects.

property.name: ADD_TO
property.shortdesc: Adds the object to the existing selection; if no object was previously selected, makes the object the only selected object.

property.name: REPLACE_WITH
property.shortdesc: Selects the object and deselects any previously selected objects.

property.name: SET_KEY
property.shortdesc: Sets the key object. At least 2 objects must be selected, and the key object specified must be one of them.
